title: Do I need to own snowdown graves to get the gold chroma?
body: Do I need to own snowdown graves to get the gold chroma?

replies.body:
To the best of my knowledge, to get the chroma no, but to use the chroma yes.

However, I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support as I'm not certain.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
